Mabou Mines. advertisement and program for "The Red Horse Animation" at the Guggenheim, 1970; Advertisement for "The Red Horse Animation," "Play" and "Come and Go" at La Mama, 1971; advertisiement for "Sain and the football Player" and "The B-Beaver Animation" at Loeb Student Center, 1973; Advertisement for "Mabou Mines performs Samuel Beckett" at Theater for the New City, 1975; advertisement fo "new Work adn Old Work" at Paula Cooper Gallery; Adbertisement for "Come and Go" and "B Beaver" at New York Theatre Ensemble.
